body: I'm always changing my skin and the resource pack I use usually because I get bored of them really quickly. Could you recommend me some really good skins + resource packs that I hopefully won't get bored of? ;3
body_tagged: I'm always changing my skin and the resource pack I use usually because I get bored of them really quickly. Could you recommend me some really good skins + resource packs that I hopefully won't get bored of? ;3
title: Skins +  Resource packs
